text: Kim Yo-jong (, born 26 September 1987) is a North Korean politician. She is the youngest daughter of former supreme leader Kim Jong-il. Her brother is Kim Jong-un, the current supreme leader. She is an alternate member of the Politburo (Political Bureau) and vice director of the Propaganda and Agitation Department of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:North Korean politicians Category:People from Pyongyang
title: Kim Yo-jong
